Sprite

Class SpriteSheet

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sprite.SpriteSheet

  • public class SpriteSheet
extends java.lang.Object
    Sprite sheet class. Represents a sheet of sprites (images).
    Author:
    josemiguelmelo

      • loadSprite

        public void loadSprite()
        Loads all sprites from spritesheet file. Sprites loaded are stored in a bidimensional array.
